'''Bearn''' is a character in {{poe2}}.
__NOTOC__

## Background

{{Description|Unlike the other survivors you've seen, this young man, despite a haggard look and a set of dirt-smeared, tattered clothes, wears a calm face and speaks with a steady voice.}}

Bearn is Elafa's son and unfortunately for Edér, not his son, as he knew his father before the Purges killed him. He lost his mother too, though on the cusp on adulthood, when the flu took her on Hasongo. Problem is, when he was lost in his grief, the [Partisans of the Lighted Path](/partisansOfTheLightedPath/) exploited his vulnerability and molded him into a religious fanatic, bent on sacrificing his soul to the walking titan.
